mapper.select:
SELECT permis.url, permis.`name`, permis.id, lastPermis.`name` AS lastPermis, attr.`name` AS typeName FROM sys_permission AS permis LEFT JOIN sys_permission AS lastPermis ON permis.fatherId = lastPermis.id INNER JOIN sys_attribute_detail attr ON permis.type = attr.id WHERE (1 = 1)
AND permis.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dto.keyword},'%')

SELECT permis.url, permis.`name`, permis.id FROM sys_permission AS permis WHERE (1=1)
AND permis.url LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
SELECT permis.`name`, permis.id FROM sys_permission AS permis WHERE permis.type = #{type}
SELECT permis.id, permis.`name`, permis.fatherId AS lastId FROM sys_permission permis WHERE permis.fatherId = '0'
SELECT permis.id, permis.`name` FROM sys_permission permis WHERE permis.fatherId = '0'
SELECT permis.id, permis.`name` FROM sys_permission permis WHERE permis.fatherId = #{fatherId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_permission permis WHERE permis.url = #{requestUrl}
